name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early April 2017
description: As always, we continue to make improvements to Aurelia's core as well as its most popular plugins. This set of releases includes not only bug fixes, but substantial improvements to the Aurelia Webpack Plugin, Aurelia UX, Aurelia CLI and our UI Virtualization Library.
content:
As always, we continue to make improvements to Aurelia's core as well as its most popular plugins. This set of releases includes not only bug fixes, but substantial improvements to the Aurelia Webpack Plugin, Aurelia UX, Aurelia CLI and our UI Virtualization Library.

In addition to the improvements we're announcing today, in the next week we'll be making announcements around new Webpack skeletons and our new dialog plugin.

## Minor Releases

Minor updates include new features, updates to bugs and performance

### [aurelia-router 1.3.0](https://github.com/aurelia/router/compare/1.2.1...v1.3.0)

#### Features

* **viewport:** add viewport name to life cycle arguments ([34ef2c4](https://github.com/aurelia/router/commit/34ef2c4))

### [aurelia-templating-resources 1.4.0](https://github.com/aurelia/templating-resources/compare/1.3.1...v1.4.0)

#### Features

* **templating:** support popular CSS transpiler file extensions in the require element ([901cfd8](https://github.com/aurelia/templating-resources/commit/901cfd8))

### aurelia-webpack-plugin 2.0.0-rc.2

#### Features

* flag to opt-out of IE support
* support module.loaders

#### Bug Fixes

* errors might crash SubFolderPlugin
* compat with IE < 11
* support more CommonJS import styles

### [aurelia-cli 0.28.0](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/compare/0.27.0...v0.28.0)

#### Bug Fixes

* **all:** improved error reporting ([4060148](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/4060148))
* **build:** enforce strict mode ([1694290](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/1694290))
* **bundle:** ensure that dependencies are added in order ([51a2cce](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/51a2cce))
* **project-template:** paths should be relatively from src ([b23c8dd](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/b23c8dd))
* **sourcemap:** use src as the sourceroot for sourcemaps ([87ca276](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/87ca276))
* **test:** resolve join of undefined error ([0207c78](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/0207c78))

#### Features

* **index.html:** add viewport meta element ([96ce8a9](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/96ce8a9))
